column2: "There are too many in ARKS who don't send Good Jobs! It's such a waste, if you ask me."
"Sending a Good Job doesn't just benefit you, it helps the recipient out as well!"
"Even as we speak, I can feel the specter of anxiety rearing its ugly head! You, send one right now!"
"Send what? A Good Job, of course!"
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Go put my mind at ease, already!"

"A Good Job is a way to send another player a small message of support. When you send a Good Job, you and the recipient can both earn FUN.

You can send a Good Job by selecting a character, or by choosing \"Send a Good Job\" from any of the menus below.
・Friend list
・Team member list
・Party member list
・Nearby Characters
・Communication History
・ARKS Search"

"You can send a Good Job without a comment, but if you do add a comment, you can earn more FUN.

Sending a Good Job can only earn FUN once per day for each recipient."
